mapper.insert:
select pictureReport_seq.nextval from dual
insert into pictureReport(pictureReportNo, pictureNo, pictureReportDate, pictureReportState, pictureReportContent, reporter, receiver) values(#{pictureReportNo}, #{pictureNo}, sysdate, #{pictureReportState}, #{pictureReportContent}, #{reporter}, #{receiver})
mapper.select: select reporter, receiver, pictureReportContent from pictureReport
